00051 #include "youbot/YouBotManipulator.hpp"
00052 namespace youbot {
00053 
00054 YouBotManipulator::YouBotManipulator(const std::string name, const std::string configFilePath)
00055 : ethercatMaster(EthercatMaster::getInstance("youbot-ethercat.cfg", configFilePath)) {
00056   // Bouml preserved body begin 00067F71
00057 
00058     this->controllerType = 841;
00059     this->alternativeControllerType = 1610;
00060     this->minFirmwareVersion = 1.48;
00061 
00062     string filename;
00063     filename = name;
00064     filename.append(".cfg");
00065     useGripper = true;
00066     configfile.reset(new ConfigFile(filename, configFilePath));
00067     
00068     if(ethercatMaster.isThreadActive()){
00069       ethercatMasterWithThread = static_cast<EthercatMasterWithThread*>(&(EthercatMaster::getInstance()));
00070     }else{
00071       ethercatMasterWithThread = NULL;
00072     }
00073 
00074     this->initializeJoints();
00075     
00076 
00077 
00078   // Bouml preserved body end 00067F71
00079 }
00080 
00081 YouBotManipulator::~YouBotManipulator() {
00082   // Bouml preserved body begin 00067FF1
00083     if(ethercatMaster.isThreadActive()){
00084       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00085         ethercatMasterWithThread->deleteJointTrajectoryControllerRegistration(this->joints[i].getJointNumber());
00086       }
00087     }
00088   // Bouml preserved body end 00067FF1
00089 }
00090 
00091 ///does the sine commutation of the arm joints
00092 void YouBotManipulator::doJointCommutation() {
00093   // Bouml preserved body begin 000A3371
00094 
00095     InitializeJoint doInitialization;
00096     bool isInitialized = false;
00097     int noInitialization = 0;
00098     std::string jointName;
00099 
00100 
00101     ClearMotorControllerTimeoutFlag clearTimeoutFlag;
00102     for (unsigned int i = 1; i <= ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00103       this->getArmJoint(i).setConfigurationParameter(clearTimeoutFlag);
00104     }
00105 
00106     for (unsigned int i = 1; i <= ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00107       doInitialization.setParameter(false);
00108       this->getArmJoint(i).getConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00109       doInitialization.getParameter(isInitialized);
00110       if (!isInitialized) {
00111         noInitialization++;
00112       }
00113     }
00114 
00115     if (noInitialization != 0) {
00116       LOG(info) << "Manipulator Joint Commutation";
00117       doInitialization.setParameter(true);
00118 
00119       ethercatMaster.AutomaticReceiveOn(false);
00120       this->getArmJoint(1).setConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00121       this->getArmJoint(2).setConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00122       this->getArmJoint(3).setConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00123       this->getArmJoint(4).setConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00124       this->getArmJoint(5).setConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00125       ethercatMaster.AutomaticReceiveOn(true);
00126 
00127       unsigned int statusFlags;
00128       std::vector<bool> isCommutated;
00129       isCommutated.assign(ARMJOINTS, false);
00130       unsigned int u = 0;
00131 
00132       // check for the next 5 sec if the joints are commutated
00133       for (u = 1; u <= 5000; u++) {
00134         for (unsigned int i = 1; i <= ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00135           if(!ethercatMaster.isThreadActive()){
00136             ethercatMaster.sendProcessData();
00137             ethercatMaster.receiveProcessData();
00138           }
00139           this->getArmJoint(i).getStatus(statusFlags);
00140           if (statusFlags & INITIALIZED) {
00141             isCommutated[i - 1] = true;
00142           }
00143         }
00144         if (isCommutated[0] && isCommutated[1] && isCommutated[2] && isCommutated[3] && isCommutated[4]) {
00145           break;
00146         }
00147         SLEEP_MILLISEC(1);
00148       }
00149 
00150       SLEEP_MILLISEC(10); // the controller likes it
00151 
00152       for (unsigned int i = 1; i <= ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00153         doInitialization.setParameter(false);
00154         this->getArmJoint(i).getConfigurationParameter(doInitialization);
00155         doInitialization.getParameter(isInitialized);
00156         if (!isInitialized) {
00157           std::stringstream jointNameStream;
00158           jointNameStream << "manipulator joint " << i;
00159           jointName = jointNameStream.str();
00160           throw std::runtime_error("Could not commutate " + jointName);
00161         }
00162       }
00163     }
00164 
00165 
00166   // Bouml preserved body end 000A3371
00167 }
00168 
00169 ///calibrate the reference position of the arm joints
00170 void YouBotManipulator::calibrateManipulator(const bool forceCalibration) {
00171   // Bouml preserved body begin 000A9C71
00172 
00173     //Calibrate all manipulator joints
00174     std::vector<JointRoundsPerMinuteSetpoint> calibrationVel;
00175     JointRoundsPerMinuteSetpoint tempdummy;
00176     tempdummy.rpm = 0;
00177     calibrationVel.assign(ARMJOINTS, tempdummy);
00178     std::vector<quantity<si::current> > maxCurrent;
00179     quantity<si::current> tempdummy2;
00180     maxCurrent.assign(ARMJOINTS, tempdummy2);
00181     std::vector<bool> doCalibration;
00182     doCalibration.assign(ARMJOINTS, true);
00183     std::string jointName;
00184 
00185     double dummy = 0;
00186     char index = 16; // Parameter 0 to 15 of bank 2 are password protected
00187 
00188     YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg IsCalibratedReadMessage;
00189     IsCalibratedReadMessage.stctOutput.moduleAddress = DRIVE;
00190     IsCalibratedReadMessage.stctOutput.commandNumber = GGP;
00191     IsCalibratedReadMessage.stctOutput.typeNumber = index;
00192     IsCalibratedReadMessage.stctOutput.motorNumber = USER_VARIABLE_BANK;
00193     IsCalibratedReadMessage.stctOutput.value = 0;
00194     IsCalibratedReadMessage.stctInput.value = 0;
00195 
00196     YouBotSlaveMailboxMsg IsCalibratedSetMessage;
00197     IsCalibratedSetMessage.stctOutput.moduleAddress = DRIVE;
00198     IsCalibratedSetMessage.stctOutput.commandNumber = SGP;
00199     IsCalibratedSetMessage.stctOutput.typeNumber = index;
00200     IsCalibratedSetMessage.stctOutput.motorNumber = USER_VARIABLE_BANK;
00201     IsCalibratedSetMessage.stctOutput.value = 1;
00202 
00203 
00204     //get parameters for calibration
00205     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00206 
00207       std::stringstream jointNameStream;
00208       jointNameStream << "Joint_" << i + 1;
00209       jointName = jointNameStream.str();
00210       bool calib = true;
00211       configfile->readInto(calib, jointName, "DoCalibration");
00212       doCalibration[i] = calib;
00213 
00214       joints[i].getConfigurationParameter(IsCalibratedReadMessage);
00215       if (IsCalibratedReadMessage.stctInput.value == 1) {
00216         doCalibration[i] = false;
00217       }
00218 
00219       if (forceCalibration) {
00220         doCalibration[i] = true;
00221       }
00222 
00223       configfile->readInto(dummy, jointName, "CalibrationMaxCurrent_[ampere]");
00224       maxCurrent[i] = dummy * ampere;
00225       std::string direction;
00226       configfile->readInto(direction, jointName, "CalibrationDirection");
00227       GearRatio gearRatio;
00228       joints[i].getConfigurationParameter(gearRatio);
00229       double gearratio = 1;
00230       gearRatio.getParameter(gearratio);
00231 
00232       if (direction == "POSITIV") {
00233         calibrationVel[i].rpm = 1 / gearratio;
00234       } else if (direction == "NEGATIV") {
00235         calibrationVel[i].rpm = -1 / gearratio;
00236       } else {
00237         throw std::runtime_error("Wrong calibration direction for " + jointName);
00238       }
00239     }
00240 
00241 
00242     LOG(info) << "Calibrate Manipulator Joints ";
00243 
00244     std::vector<bool> finished;
00245     finished.assign(ARMJOINTS, false);
00246     JointSensedCurrent sensedCurrent;
00247     JointRoundsPerMinuteSetpoint stopMovement;
00248     stopMovement.rpm = 0;
00249     JointPWMSetpoint pwmStopMovement;
00250     pwmStopMovement.pwm = 0;
00251 
00252 
00253     //move the joints slowly in calibration direction
00254     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00255       if (doCalibration[i] == true) {
00256         joints[i].setData(calibrationVel[i]);
00257         if(!ethercatMaster.isThreadActive()){
00258           ethercatMaster.sendProcessData();
00259           ethercatMaster.receiveProcessData();
00260         }
00261       } else {
00262         finished[i] = true;
00263       }
00264     }
00265 
00266     //monitor the current to find end stop 
00267     while (!(finished[0] && finished[1] && finished[2] && finished[3] && finished[4])) {
00268       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00269         if(!ethercatMaster.isThreadActive()){
00270           ethercatMaster.sendProcessData();
00271           ethercatMaster.receiveProcessData();
00272         }
00273         joints[i].getData(sensedCurrent);
00274         //turn till a max current is reached
00275         if (abs(sensedCurrent.current) > abs(maxCurrent[i])) {
00276           //stop movement
00277           joints[i].setData(pwmStopMovement);
00278           if(!ethercatMaster.isThreadActive()){
00279             ethercatMaster.sendProcessData();
00280             ethercatMaster.receiveProcessData();
00281           }
00282           finished[i] = true;
00283         }
00284       }
00285       SLEEP_MILLISEC(1);
00286     }
00287 
00288     // wait to let the joint stop the motion
00289     SLEEP_MILLISEC(100);
00290 
00291     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00292       if (doCalibration[i] == true) {
00293         //set encoder reference position
00294         joints[i].setEncoderToZero();
00295         if(!ethercatMaster.isThreadActive()){
00296           ethercatMaster.sendProcessData();
00297           ethercatMaster.receiveProcessData();
00298         }
00299         // set a flag in the user variable to remember that it is calibrated
00300         joints[i].setConfigurationParameter(IsCalibratedSetMessage);
00301         //     LOG(info) << "Calibration finished for joint: " << this->jointName;
00302       }
00303     }
00304 
00305     //setting joint Limits
00306     JointLimits jLimits;
00307     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00308       long upperlimit = 0, lowerlimit = 0;
00309       std::stringstream jointNameStream;
00310       jointNameStream << "Joint_" << i + 1;
00311       jointName = jointNameStream.str();
00312       JointEncoderSetpoint minEncoderValue;
00313       configfile->readInto(lowerlimit, jointName, "LowerLimit_[encoderTicks]");
00314       configfile->readInto(upperlimit, jointName, "UpperLimit_[encoderTicks]");
00315       minEncoderValue.encoderTicks = upperlimit;
00316 
00317       jLimits.setParameter(lowerlimit, upperlimit, true);
00318       joints[i].setConfigurationParameter(jLimits);
00319     }
00320 
00321 
00322 
00323   // Bouml preserved body end 000A9C71
00324 }
00325 
00326 void YouBotManipulator::calibrateGripper(const bool forceCalibration) {
00327   // Bouml preserved body begin 000A9CF1
00328     // Calibrating Gripper
00329     bool doCalibration = true;
00330     configfile->readInto(doCalibration, "Gripper", "DoCalibration");
00331     if(useGripper && doCalibration){
00332       CalibrateGripper calibrate;
00333       calibrate.setParameter(forceCalibration);
00334       gripper->setConfigurationParameter(calibrate);
00335     }
00336   // Bouml preserved body end 000A9CF1
00337 }
00338 
00339 ///return a joint form the arm1
00340 ///@param armJointNumber 1-5 for the arm1 joints
00341 YouBotJoint& YouBotManipulator::getArmJoint(const unsigned int armJointNumber) {
00342   // Bouml preserved body begin 0004F7F1
00343 
00344     if (armJointNumber <= 0 || armJointNumber > ARMJOINTS) {
00345       throw std::out_of_range("Invalid Joint Number");
00346     }
00347     return joints[armJointNumber - 1];
00348   // Bouml preserved body end 0004F7F1
00349 }
00350 
00351 YouBotGripper& YouBotManipulator::getArmGripper() {
00352   // Bouml preserved body begin 0005F9F1
00353     if(!useGripper){
00354       throw std::runtime_error("The gripper is disabled!");
00355     }
00356     return *gripper;
00357   // Bouml preserved body end 0005F9F1
00358 }
00359 
00360 ///commands positions or angles to all manipulator joints
00361 ///all positions will be set at the same time
00362 ///@param JointData the to command positions
00363 void YouBotManipulator::setJointData(const std::vector<JointAngleSetpoint>& JointData) {
00364   // Bouml preserved body begin 0008FDF1
00365     if (JointData.size() != ARMJOINTS)
00366       throw std::out_of_range("Wrong number of JointAngleSetpoints");
00367 
00368     ethercatMaster.AutomaticSendOn(false);
00369     joints[0].setData(JointData[0], NON_BLOCKING);
00370     joints[1].setData(JointData[1], NON_BLOCKING);
00371     joints[2].setData(JointData[2], NON_BLOCKING);
00372     joints[3].setData(JointData[3], NON_BLOCKING);
00373     joints[4].setData(JointData[4], NON_BLOCKING);
00374     ethercatMaster.AutomaticSendOn(true);
00375 
00376   // Bouml preserved body end 0008FDF1
00377 }
00378 
00379 ///gets the position or angle of all manipulator joints which have been calculated from the actual encoder value
00380 ///These values are all read at the same time from the different joints 
00381 ///@param data returns the angles by reference
00382 void YouBotManipulator::getJointData(std::vector<JointSensedAngle>& data) {
00383   // Bouml preserved body begin 0008FE71
00384     data.resize(ARMJOINTS);
00385     ethercatMaster.AutomaticReceiveOn(false);
00386     joints[0].getData(data[0]);
00387     joints[1].getData(data[1]);
00388     joints[2].getData(data[2]);
00389     joints[3].getData(data[3]);
00390     joints[4].getData(data[4]);
00391     ethercatMaster.AutomaticReceiveOn(true);
00392   // Bouml preserved body end 0008FE71
00393 }

00401       throw std::out_of_range("Wrong number of JointVelocitySetpoints");
00402 
00403     ethercatMaster.AutomaticSendOn(false);
00404     joints[0].setData(JointData[0], NON_BLOCKING);
00405     joints[1].setData(JointData[1], NON_BLOCKING);
00406     joints[2].setData(JointData[2], NON_BLOCKING);
00407     joints[3].setData(JointData[3], NON_BLOCKING);
00408     joints[4].setData(JointData[4], NON_BLOCKING);
00409     ethercatMaster.AutomaticSendOn(true);
00410   // Bouml preserved body end 0008FEF1
00411 }

00497 bool YouBotManipulator::areSame(const double A, const double B) {
00498   // Bouml preserved body begin 000A82F1
00499     return std::fabs(A - B) < 0.0001;
00500   // Bouml preserved body end 000A82F1
00501 }
00502 
00503 void YouBotManipulator::initializeJoints() {
00504   // Bouml preserved body begin 00068071
00505 
00506  //   LOG(info) << "Initializing Joints";
00507 
00508 
00509     //get number of slaves
00510     unsigned int noSlaves = ethercatMaster.getNumberOfSlaves();
00511 
00512 
00513     if (noSlaves < ARMJOINTS) {
00514       throw std::runtime_error("Not enough ethercat slaves were found to create a YouBotManipulator!");
00515     }
00516 
00517 
00518     unsigned int slaveNumber = 0;
00519     configfile->readInto(slaveNumber, "JointTopology", "ManipulatorJoint1");
00520     if (slaveNumber <= noSlaves) {
00521       joints.push_back(new YouBotJoint(slaveNumber));
00522     } else {
00523       throw std::out_of_range("The ethercat slave number is not available!");
00524     }
00525 
00526     configfile->readInto(slaveNumber, "JointTopology", "ManipulatorJoint2");
00527     if (slaveNumber <= noSlaves) {
00528       joints.push_back(new YouBotJoint(slaveNumber));
00529     } else {
00530       throw std::out_of_range("The ethercat slave number is not available!");
00531     }
00532 
00533     configfile->readInto(slaveNumber, "JointTopology", "ManipulatorJoint3");
00534     if (slaveNumber <= noSlaves) {
00535       joints.push_back(new YouBotJoint(slaveNumber));
00536     } else {
00537       throw std::out_of_range("The ethercat slave number is not available!");
00538     }
00539 
00540     configfile->readInto(slaveNumber, "JointTopology", "ManipulatorJoint4");
00541     if (slaveNumber <= noSlaves) {
00542       joints.push_back(new YouBotJoint(slaveNumber));
00543     } else {
00544       throw std::out_of_range("The ethercat slave number is not available!");
00545     }
00546 
00547     configfile->readInto(slaveNumber, "JointTopology", "ManipulatorJoint5");
00548     if (slaveNumber <= noSlaves) {
00549       joints.push_back(new YouBotJoint(slaveNumber));
00550     } else {
00551       throw std::out_of_range("The ethercat slave number is not available!");
00552     }
00553 
00554 
00555 
00556 
00557 
00558     //Configure Joint Parameters
00559     std::string jointName;
00560     JointName jName;
00561     GearRatio gearRatio;
00562     EncoderTicksPerRound ticksPerRound;
00563     InverseMovementDirection inverseDir;
00564     double gearRatio_numerator = 0;
00565     double gearRatio_denominator = 1;
00566     FirmwareVersion firmwareTypeVersion;
00567     TorqueConstant torqueConst;
00568 
00569 
00570     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < ARMJOINTS; i++) {
00571       std::stringstream jointNameStream;
00572       jointNameStream << "Joint_" << i + 1;
00573       jointName = jointNameStream.str();
00574 
00575 
00576       joints[i].getConfigurationParameter(firmwareTypeVersion);
00577       std::string version;
00578       int controllerType;
00579       double firmwareVersion;
00580       firmwareTypeVersion.getParameter(controllerType, firmwareVersion);
00581 
00582       string name;
00583       configfile->readInto(name, jointName, "JointName");
00584       jName.setParameter(name);
00585 
00586       LOG(info) << name << "\t Controller Type: " << controllerType << "  Firmware version: " << firmwareVersion;
00587 
00588       if (this->controllerType != controllerType && alternativeControllerType != controllerType) {
00589         std::stringstream ss;
00590         ss << "The youBot manipulator motor controller have to be of type: " << this->controllerType << " or " << alternativeControllerType;
00591         throw std::runtime_error(ss.str().c_str());
00592       }
00593 
00594       if (!areSame(firmwareVersion, this->minFirmwareVersion)) {
00595         if (firmwareVersion < this->minFirmwareVersion) {
00596           std::stringstream ss;
00597           ss << "The motor controller firmware version have be " << this->minFirmwareVersion << " or higher.";
00598           throw std::runtime_error(ss.str().c_str());
00599         }
00600       }
00601 
00602       configfile->readInto(gearRatio_numerator, jointName, "GearRatio_numerator");
00603       configfile->readInto(gearRatio_denominator, jointName, "GearRatio_denominator");
00604       gearRatio.setParameter(gearRatio_numerator / gearRatio_denominator);
00605       int ticks;
00606       configfile->readInto(ticks, jointName, "EncoderTicksPerRound");
00607       ticksPerRound.setParameter(ticks);
00608       
00609       double torqueConstant;
00610       configfile->readInto(torqueConstant, jointName, "TorqueConstant_[newton_meter_divided_by_ampere]");
00611       torqueConst.setParameter(torqueConstant);
00612       
00613       bool invdir = false;
00614       configfile->readInto(invdir, jointName, "InverseMovementDirection");
00615       inverseDir.setParameter(invdir);
00616 
00617       joints[i].setConfigurationParameter(jName);
00618       joints[i].setConfigurationParameter(gearRatio);
00619       joints[i].setConfigurationParameter(ticksPerRound);
00620       joints[i].setConfigurationParameter(torqueConst);
00621       joints[i].setConfigurationParameter(inverseDir);
00622       
00623       //Joint Trajectory Controller
00624       /*
00625       if(ethercatMaster.isThreadActive()){
00626         unsigned int numberOfThreadCyclesPerSecond = ethercatMasterWithThread->getNumberOfThreadCyclesPerSecond();
00627         joints[i].trajectoryController.setControllerUpdatesPerSecond(numberOfThreadCyclesPerSecond);
00628         ethercatMasterWithThread->registerJointTrajectoryController(&(joints[i].trajectoryController), joints[i].getJointNumber());
00629       }
00630       */
00631     }
00632 
00633 
00634     configfile->readInto(useGripper, "Gripper", "EnableGripper");
00635     
00636     if(useGripper){
00637     //Initializing Gripper
00638     configfile->readInto(slaveNumber, "JointTopology", "ManipulatorJoint5");
00639     this->gripper.reset(new YouBotGripper(slaveNumber));
00640     BarSpacingOffset barOffest;
00641     MaxTravelDistance maxDistance;
00642     MaxEncoderValue maxEncoder;
00643     GripperBarName BarName;
00644     double dummy = 0;
00645     int controllerType;
00646     double firmwareVersion;
00647     string barname;
00648     
00649     GripperFirmwareVersion gripperVersion;
00650     this->gripper->getConfigurationParameter(gripperVersion);
00651     gripperVersion.getParameter(controllerType, firmwareVersion);
00652     
00653     LOG(info) << "Gripper" << "\t\t Controller Type: " << controllerType << "  Firmware version: " << firmwareVersion;
00654 
00655     // Gripper Bar 1
00656     configfile->readInto(barname, "GripperBar1", "BarName");
00657     BarName.setParameter(barname);
00658     this->gripper->getGripperBar1().setConfigurationParameter(BarName);
00659     
00660     configfile->readInto(dummy, "GripperBar1", "BarSpacingOffset_[meter]");
00661     barOffest.setParameter(dummy * meter);
00662     this->gripper->getGripperBar1().setConfigurationParameter(barOffest);
00663     
00664     configfile->readInto(dummy, "GripperBar1", "MaxTravelDistance_[meter]");
00665     maxDistance.setParameter(dummy * meter);
00666     this->gripper->getGripperBar1().setConfigurationParameter(maxDistance);
00667     
00668     int maxenc = 0;
00669     configfile->readInto(maxenc, "GripperBar1", "MaxEncoderValue");
00670     maxEncoder.setParameter(maxenc);
00671     this->gripper->getGripperBar1().setConfigurationParameter(maxEncoder);
00672     
00673     int stallThreshold = 0;
00674     configfile->readInto(stallThreshold, "GripperBar1", "StallGuard2Threshold");
00675     StallGuard2Threshold threshold;
00676     threshold.setParameter(stallThreshold);
00677     this->gripper->getGripperBar1().setConfigurationParameter(threshold);
00678 
00679     bool stallGuardFilter = false;
00680     configfile->readInto(stallGuardFilter, "GripperBar1", "StallGuard2FilterEnable");
00681     StallGuard2FilterEnable filter;
00682     filter.setParameter(stallGuardFilter);
00683     this->gripper->getGripperBar1().setConfigurationParameter(filter);
00684     
00685     // Gripper Bar 2
00686     configfile->readInto(barname, "GripperBar2", "BarName");
00687     BarName.setParameter(barname);
00688     this->gripper->getGripperBar2().setConfigurationParameter(BarName);
00689     
00690     configfile->readInto(dummy, "GripperBar2", "BarSpacingOffset_[meter]");
00691     barOffest.setParameter(dummy * meter);
00692     this->gripper->getGripperBar2().setConfigurationParameter(barOffest);
00693     
00694     configfile->readInto(dummy, "GripperBar2", "MaxTravelDistance_[meter]");
00695     maxDistance.setParameter(dummy * meter);
00696     this->gripper->getGripperBar2().setConfigurationParameter(maxDistance);
00697 
00698     configfile->readInto(maxenc, "GripperBar2", "MaxEncoderValue");
00699     maxEncoder.setParameter(maxenc);
00700     this->gripper->getGripperBar2().setConfigurationParameter(maxEncoder);
00701     
00702     configfile->readInto(stallThreshold, "GripperBar2", "StallGuard2Threshold");
00703     threshold.setParameter(stallThreshold);
00704     this->gripper->getGripperBar2().setConfigurationParameter(threshold);
00705 
00706     configfile->readInto(stallGuardFilter, "GripperBar2", "StallGuard2FilterEnable");
00707     filter.setParameter(stallGuardFilter);
00708     this->gripper->getGripperBar2().setConfigurationParameter(filter);
00709     }
00710     
00711 
00712     return;

00714 }
